titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace, to confirme to his subiects of the realme of Ireland, their defective titles, and to establish their estates and possessions by his commission vnder his great Seale of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace, to confirme to his subiects of the realme of Ireland, their defective titles, and to establish their estates and possessions by his commission vnder his great Seale of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall the fourteenth day of March, in the sixt yeere of our reigne.
The publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 21; Steele notation: of meanes 2) in Estate.
Identified as STC 14220a on UMI microfilm reel 1244.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
